channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins VncRecorder Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins VncRecorder Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2205|2024-08-04T07:01:41.048Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vncrecorder%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins VncRecorder Plugin 1.25 and earlier does not escape a tool path in the `checkVncServ` form validation endpoint, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by Jenkins administrators.

item.title: CVE-2020-2206|2024-08-04T07:01:41.180Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20vncrecorder%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins VncRecorder Plugin 1.25 and earlier does not escape a parameter value in the checkVncServ form validation endpoint, resulting in a reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
